title: after 128.4.3esr can't access mail server- invalid certificate but when adding an exception says valid no need
content:
after latest update nov 12 128.4.3esr 32 bit my wife can not access our same email server mail.patokalakemarina.com. Gets security alert of invalid certificate. When I try to add an exception says is good and don't need an exception.

My 64 bit machine took the upgrade ok, no alert, and her android phone still accesses. Every box is checked the same as my 64bit. How to roll back an update?
creator: md40

title: Why is Thunderbird loading only inbox messages for me?
content: Why are only inbox messages loading when I connect my email via Thunderbird? I can't find sent, draft messages and others when I connect my email accounts to Thunderbird. However, all categories loads when I login to the webmail. Why is Thunderbird loading only inbox messages for me?
creator: ucheupper

title: Thunderbird will not receive or send
content: I have successfully used Thunderbird for 7-8 years for my business e-mail account. About 2 weeks ago the platform simply wouldn't send or receive any more and I have no idea why. I would like some help to get this working once again
creator: nlelew123

title: password change in Microsoft = pop3 error in TB emal
content: I had to change my Microsoft password and I believe it didn't change for my TB email account. I no longer know the old password (I use Keeper to make pw changes). I get a pop3 account password error and no longer can get email in TB. I am currently unhappily using Outlook. I made changes on my pc to meet the new requirements mandated by Microsoft: incoming server - pop3.live.com:995; SSL/TLS; 0Auth2 and outgoing server - smtp.office365.com:587; STARTTLS; 0Auth2. Appreciate some help. Thanks
creator: rickesk

title: Can't add outlook account - blocked cookies?
content:
Please help! I am trying to add an outlook.com account. Mac (Sequoia) -Firefox (132.0.2) -Thunderbird (nebula) The login page flashes briefly, but then I get I get the dreaded: 

"Microsoft (logo). We can't sign you in

Your browser is currently set to block cookies. You need to allow cookies to use this service." https://login.live.com/cookiesDisabled.srf?

No matter what I do in Firefox-Setting-Privacy nothing helps! I've tried changing my default browser to Safari and that doesn't help either.

Please help!
creator: jenny.pizzica

title: cant receive or send emails
content: I cant receive or send emails from my computer

title: Posta in arrivo, messaggi non visualizzabili
content:
Ciao a Tutti.

Da stamattina non riesco più a vedere i messaggi nella posta in arrivo. I messaggi sono presenti, screenshot allegato, ma il riquadro della posta in arrivo non me li va visualizzare. Windows home 64 - Thunderbird 128.4.3esr (64 bit). Credo sia un problema di filtri ma non riesco più a ripristinare la situazione. Grazie in anticipo per il vostro supporto.
creator: dr.drome
